name: Modal
description: Modal component for displaying dialog content. This component replaces Material UI's Dialog component with a simplified API that matches the Syncrofy design system. It provides built-in title, content, and actions sections.

props.name: open
props.description: If true, the modal is open

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the modal should close

props.name: actions
props.description: Actions to display at the bottom of the modal. Typically contains buttons for actions like "Cancel" and "Confirm"

props.name: showCloseButton
props.description: If true, displays a close button (X) in the title bar

props.name: maxWidth
props.description: The maximum width of the modal

props.name: closeOnBackdropClick
props.description: If true, clicking the backdrop will close the modal

examples.title: Default
examples.description: Basic modal with title and content

examples.title: With Actions
Different Sizes
examples.code:
import { Modal } from '@/components';

migrationExamples.mui:
import { Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions } from '@mui/material';

<Dialog open={open} onClose={handleClose}>
  <DialogTitle>Title</DialogTitle>
  <DialogContent>
    Content here
  </DialogContent>
  <DialogActions>
    <Button>Cancel</Button>
    <Button>Confirm</Button>
  </DialogActions>
</Dialog>
migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Dialog with design system Modal

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: ESC key closes modal (if enabled), Tab key cycles through focusable elements, focus trap when open
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Modal title and content are announced when opened, focus returns to trigger element on close

whenToUse: Important information that requires user attention
Content that should interrupt user flow
whenNotToUse: Full-page content (use a separate page/route instead)
bestPractices: Always provide a title for accessibility
Use actions prop for buttons at the bottom
Ensure modal content is scrollable if needed
commonPatterns: Information modals with single Close button
